dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context
Class ECUConfigContext

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.util.AbstractExecutableExtension
      dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context.AbstractContext
          dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context.ECUConfigContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
IContext, dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context.internal.ISelectionContextChangedListener, java.lang.Cloneable, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension
public class ECUConfigContext
extends AbstractContext
implements dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context.internal.ISelectionContextChangedListener

This class manages the selection context for the ECU configuration project. Attribute access functions: 

 getAttributeNames()
 getAttribute( String <name> )
The following attributes are available:
  • projectname
  • target
  • derivate
  • relVersion
  • ecuid
  • generationpath
In addition to these attributes for each module inside a project there exist two attributes:
  • moduleId.<the Id of the module> with value true(enabled) ore false(disabled)
  • moduleType.<the category type of the module> with value true(enabled) ore false(disabled)
The attributes can be used to restrict the visibility of guided configuration wizards via the extension point. There the attributes have to be prefixed with the context id to be unique. The id ( "ECUConfigContext" ) can be queried with 
 getId()
To get a clone of the enabled context, use 
 clone()

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved

Since:
2008.b

ID

public static final java.lang.String ID

See Also:
Constant Field Values

ATTRPREFIX_MODULE_ID

public static final java.lang.String ATTRPREFIX_MODULE_ID
A variable for each module-id of each module configuration in the project is created with the following syntax: 
  MODULE_ID + <module-id> = "true"
E.g.: 
 moduleId.Can_TS_T19D4M2I0R0 = true
For all modules that do not have a configuration in the project the value of the variable is set to false.

Since:
2008.b
See Also:
Constant Field Values

ATTRPREFIX_MODULE_TYPE

public static final java.lang.String ATTRPREFIX_MODULE_TYPE
For each module-type for which a module configuration is part of the project a variable with the value: 
  MODULE_TYPE + <module-type> = "true"
is created. E.g.: 
 moduleType.Can = true
For all modules that do not have a configuration in the project the value of the variable is set to false.

Since:
2008.b
See Also:
